markdownRemark.html:
Presenter: Dr. Anne Deckert

Dr. Anne Deckert has been a veterinary epidemiologist with the Canadian Integrated Program for Antimicrobial Resistance Surveillance at the Public Health Agency of Canada since 1999. She obtained her DVM in 1990 from the Ontario Veterinary College at the University of Guelph, a MSc from the University of Nebraska-Lincoln in 1995 and a PhD from the University of Guelph in 2012. Her PhD focused on antimicrobial resistance of Campylobacter from humans and retail chicken.
